We can take him down easy When a character in this Unit makes an attack targeting an enemy Primary character, this Unit may use this ability. Add 2 dice to the attack roll. We specialize in making entrances When a character in an allied Fil's Squad Unit makes an attack as part of a combat action, after the effect is resolved, this Unit may use this ability. If the defending character is within 2 of an Active objective, one allied Jedi character may Toward that objective.
